prop153672419.address: Eskdale Terrace, Newcastle Upon Tyne, NE2
prop153672419.description: Age Exclusive home for the over 60s'. "As new" condition throughout. Boasting one of the largest balconies on the development. This delightful 2nd floor apartment offers versatile accommodation, two double bedrooms, ensuite, bathroom and generous amounts of storage. Communal lounge and on site host.
